generatePass
The function automatically generates a password for the user account that meets the current
security policy
.
Syntax
generatePass
( )
No parameters.
Note
The function is called using
Users and Groups tab
of the algorithm editor toolbar.
Use example
For example, it is required to generate a password that meets the established security requirements.
The algorithm can be as follows:
After saving the data, the algorithm will generate a password for the user account, while the resulting value will correspond to the input mask set in the settings of the current
security policy
.
This function was used to configure the
Automatic user creation
user case.
